    • isFirstLogin

      public boolean isFirstLogin(String password)
      checks whether it is the first time user log in to the system
      Parameters:
      password - current password of the User
      Returns:
      true if first login
      See Also:
      • LoginController.isFirstLogin(String)

    • login

      public boolean login(String userID, String password)
      check successful login by user
      Parameters:
      userID - The unique ID of the User
      password - current password of the User
      Returns:
      true if login success
      See Also:
      • LoginController.login(String, String)

    • changePassword

      public void changePassword(String userID, String newPassword) throws PasswordException
      check if old password matches new password and changes the password for user
      Parameters:
      userID - The unique ID of the User
      newPassword - new password of the User
      Throws:
      PasswordException - if new password is the same as current
      See Also:
      • PasswordController.changePassword(String, String)

    • isPasswordStrong

      public void isPasswordStrong(String newPassword) throws PasswordException
      checks if new password fits system requirements
      Parameters:
      newPassword - new password of the User
      Throws:
      PasswordException - if new password is not strong
      See Also:
      • PasswordController.isPasswordStrong(String)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      STAFF or STUDENT
